collection: Science Fiction, Dystopian, and Techtopian Literature

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A chilling portrayal of a totalitarian state with omnipresent government surveillance.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A world where humans are genetically bred and conditioned for predetermined roles in society.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.description: A future where books are outlawed and 'firemen' burn any that are found.

books.title: The Handmaid's Tale
books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.description: A theocratic regime subjugates women and controls reproduction.

books.title: Neuromancer
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: A hacker navigates virtual reality and AI in a dystopian corporate future.

books.title: We
books.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin
books.description: Citizens of the One State live in glass apartments under constant surveillance.

books.title: The Dispossessed
books.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
books.description: A physicist from an anarchist moon colony visits a capitalist planet.

books.title: Snow Crash
books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: A hacker battles a digital virus in a balkanized, corporate-controlled America.

books.title: The Left Hand of Darkness
books.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
books.description: An envoy encounters an ambisexual alien society on a frozen planet.

books.title: Foundation
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: Mathematicians predict the fall of a galactic empire and work to preserve knowledge.

books.title: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
books.author: Philip K. Dick
books.description: A bounty hunter tracks rogue androids in a post-nuclear war world.

books.title: The Three-Body Problem
books.author: Liu Cixin
books.description: Earth faces potential invasion from an alien civilization during the Cultural Revolution.

books.title: Solaris
books.author: Stanisław Lem
books.description: A sentient ocean planet creates physical manifestations of human memories.

books.title: The Stars My Destination
books.author: Alfred Bester
books.description: A brutalized spacer gains the power of teleportation and seeks revenge.

books.title: The Man in the High Castle
books.author: Philip K. Dick
books.description: Life in America after the Axis powers won World War II.

books.title: A Clockwork Orange
books.author: Anthony Burgess
books.description: A violent youth undergoes behavioral conditioning in a dystopian future.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: Teenagers fight to the death in televised games in a post-apocalyptic nation.

books.title: Ender's Game
books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.description: A brilliant child is trained to lead humanity's fleet against an alien threat.

books.title: The Windup Girl
books.author: Paolo Bacigalupi
books.description: A bioengineered woman navigates a future Thailand ravaged by climate change.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Noble houses compete for control of a desert planet producing a valuable spice.

books.title: The Road
books.author: Cormac McCarthy
books.description: A father and son journey through a devastated America.

books.title: Altered Carbon
books.author: Richard K. Morgan
books.description: Human consciousness can be digitized and transferred between bodies.

books.title: The Forever War
books.author: Joe Haldeman
books.description: Soldiers fighting an interstellar war experience extreme time dilation.

books.title: Childhood's End
books.author: Arthur C. Clarke
books.description: Mysterious aliens oversee humanity's transformation into a utopian society.

books.title: The Martian Chronicles
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.description: Interconnected stories about the colonization and settlement of Mars.

books.title: Battle Royale
books.author: Koushun Takami
books.description: A class of students is forced to fight to the death on a remote island.

books.title: The Lathe of Heaven
books.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
books.description: A man's dreams can alter reality, with a psychiatrist trying to control this power.

books.title: Parable of the Sower
books.author: Octavia E. Butler
books.description: A young woman with hyperempathy founds a new religion amid societal collapse.

books.title: Stranger in a Strange Land
books.author: Robert A. Heinlein
books.description: A human raised on Mars returns to Earth and starts a new religion.

books.title: The Diamond Age
books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: A young girl receives an interactive book designed to raise a member of the elite.

books.title: Roadside Picnic
books.author: Arkady and Boris Strugatsky
books.description: Stalkers illegally scavenge alien artifacts from mysterious visitation zones.

books.title: The City & The City
books.author: China Miéville
books.description: Two cities occupy the same physical space, with citizens trained to 'unsee' the other.

books.title: The Time Machine
books.author: H.G. Wells
books.description: A Victorian scientist travels to the year 802,701 and discovers humanity's descendants.

books.title: The War of the Worlds
books.author: H.G. Wells
books.description: Martians invade Victorian England with advanced technology.

books.title: Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
books.author: Jules Verne
books.description: A marine biologist is held captive aboard an advanced submarine.

books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: A scientist creates life but abandons his creation with tragic consequences.

books.title: The Metamorphosis of Prime Intellect
books.author: Roger Williams
books.description: An AI takes control of reality, granting humans immortality and unlimited power.

books.title: The Caves of Steel
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: A detective partners with a robot to solve a murder in an overpopulated Earth.

books.title: The Fifth Season
books.author: N.K. Jemisin
books.description: People with seismic powers are enslaved in a world of constant catastrophe.

books.title: Hyperion
books.author: Dan Simmons
books.description: Seven pilgrims share their stories while traveling to meet a mysterious entity.

books.title: Annihilation
books.author: Jeff VanderMeer
books.description: An expedition explores a mysterious, transforming area known as Area X.

books.title: Blindsight
books.author: Peter Watts
books.description: A crew of modified humans investigates an alien presence at the edge of the solar system.

books.title: The Player of Games
books.author: Iain M. Banks
books.description: A master game player is recruited to compete in an empire ruled by a complex game.

books.title: Oryx and Crake
books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.description: A bioengineered plague wipes out most of humanity, leaving a sole survivor.

books.title: The Quantum Thief
books.author: Hannu Rajaniemi
books.description: A master thief is broken out of prison to pull off an impossible heist.

books.title: The Space Merchants
books.author: Frederik Pohl and C.M. Kornbluth
books.description: Advertising agencies rule Earth and compete to colonize Venus.

books.title: Stand on Zanzibar
books.author: John Brunner
books.description: A sprawling tale of an overpopulated Earth in 2010.

books.title: The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress
books.author: Robert A. Heinlein
books.description: A lunar colony revolts against Earth rule with help from a sentient computer.

books.title: Hard-Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World
books.author: Haruki Murakami
books.description: Two parallel narratives about data encryption and a walled town where people lose their shadows.

books.title: The Sirens of Titan
books.author: Kurt Vonnegut
books.description: Human history has been manipulated by aliens for a trivial purpose.

books.title: The Day of the Triffids
books.author: John Wyndham
books.description: Most of humanity is blinded and stalked by carnivorous mobile plants.

books.title: A Canticle for Leibowitz
books.author: Walter M. Miller Jr.
books.description: Monks preserve scientific knowledge through cycles of civilization rise and fall.

books.title: The Circle
books.author: Dave Eggers
books.description: A woman joins a powerful tech company that seeks total transparency.

books.title: The Giver
books.author: Lois Lowry
books.description: A boy discovers the dark truth behind his seemingly perfect society.

books.title: The Chrysalids
books.author: John Wyndham
books.description: Telepathic children hide their abilities in a post-nuclear fundamentalist society.

books.title: The Demolished Man
books.author: Alfred Bester
books.description: A man attempts to commit murder in a world where telepathic police can read minds.

books.title: Ringworld
books.author: Larry Niven
books.description: Explorers discover an artificial ring-shaped world orbiting a star.

books.title: The Gods Themselves
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: Energy exchange with a parallel universe threatens both realities.

books.title: Rendezvous with Rama
books.author: Arthur C. Clarke
books.description: Humans explore a massive alien cylindrical spacecraft passing through the solar system.

books.title: The Wanting Seed
books.author: Anthony Burgess
books.description: An overpopulated future where the government encourages homosexuality to limit births.

books.title: The Water Knife
books.author: Paolo Bacigalupi
books.description: Water rights enforcers battle over dwindling water supplies in the American Southwest.

books.title: Ubik
books.author: Philip K. Dick
books.description: People in suspended animation after death may be experiencing a decaying reality.

books.title: Gateway
books.author: Frederik Pohl
books.description: Prospectors use abandoned alien ships with preset, unknown destinations.

books.title: The Cyberiad
books.author: Stanisław Lem
books.description: Humorous tales of two robot constructors and their fantastical inventions.

books.title: Perdido Street Station
books.author: China Miéville
books.description: A scientist's experiment unleashes nightmare creatures in a sprawling city.

books.title: Use of Weapons
books.author: Iain M. Banks
books.description: A mercenary works for a utopian civilization while haunted by his past.

books.title: Ancillary Justice
books.author: Ann Leckie
books.description: A former starship AI inhabits a single human body and seeks revenge.

books.title: The Book of the New Sun
books.author: Gene Wolfe
books.description: A torturer's apprentice journeys through a dying Earth in the distant future.

books.title: Ancillary Mercy
books.author: Ann Leckie
books.description: A former AI navigates political intrigue during a galactic civil war.

books.title: The Peripheral
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: People from a post-apocalyptic future communicate with the past.

books.title: Remembrance of Earth's Past
books.author: Liu Cixin
books.description: Trilogy exploring humanity's first contact with aliens and its consequences.

books.title: The Female Man
books.author: Joanna Russ
books.description: Four women from different parallel Earths explore various gender dynamics.

books.title: Accelerando
books.author: Charles Stross
books.description: Three generations experience accelerating technological change and the singularity.

books.title: The Peripheral
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: Near-future and far-future timelines intersect through advanced technology.

books.title: Embassytown
books.author: China Miéville
books.description: Humans interact with aliens whose language cannot accommodate lies.

books.title: The Algebraist
books.author: Iain M. Banks
books.description: A researcher among gas giant dwellers seeks ancient secrets during wartime.

books.title: Spin
books.author: Robert Charles Wilson
books.description: A mysterious barrier surrounds Earth, causing time to pass differently outside.

books.title: Babel-17
books.author: Samuel R. Delany
books.description: A poet-linguist decodes an alien language that changes how speakers think.

books.title: The Kraken Wakes
books.author: John Wyndham
books.description: Aliens colonize Earth's ocean depths and begin melting the ice caps.

books.title: Lilith's Brood
books.author: Octavia E. Butler
books.description: Aliens rescue post-apocalyptic humans but demand genetic trade.

books.title: Blood Music
books.author: Greg Bear
books.description: Sentient cells escape a lab and transform all life on Earth.

books.title: The Postman
books.author: David Brin
books.description: A drifter wearing a postal uniform becomes a symbol of restored civilization.

books.title: Schismatrix
books.author: Bruce Sterling
books.description: Competing factions pursue different paths of human enhancement.

books.title: The Stars Are Legion
books.author: Kameron Hurley
books.description: Women fight for control of decaying biological worldships.

books.title: Count Zero
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: Fragmented AIs from Neuromancer manifest as voodoo gods in cyberspace.

books.title: The Invincible
books.author: Stanisław Lem
books.description: A spaceship crew investigates the disappearance of another vessel on a strange planet.

books.title: The Uplift War
books.author: David Brin
books.description: Uplifted chimpanzees resist an alien occupation of their planet.

books.title: Bug Jack Barron
books.author: Norman Spinrad
books.description: A TV host uncovers a conspiracy behind an immortality treatment.

books.title: The Dispossessed
books.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
books.description: A physicist bridges an anarchist moon colony and a capitalist planet.

books.title: Neuromancer
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: A washed-up hacker is hired for one last job involving rogue AIs.

books.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
books.author: Arthur C. Clarke
books.description: Humanity's evolution is guided by mysterious alien monoliths.

books.title: The Sirens of Titan
books.author: Kurt Vonnegut
books.description: All of human history was manipulated by aliens to deliver a spare part.

books.title: Red Mars
books.author: Kim Stanley Robinson
books.description: The first hundred colonists begin the terraforming of Mars.

books.title: The Invisible Man
books.author: H.G. Wells
books.description: A scientist discovers invisibility but descends into madness.

books.title: Ready Player One
books.author: Ernest Cline
books.description: A teenager hunts for an Easter egg in a virtual reality world.

books.title: The Calculating Stars
books.author: Mary Robinette Kowal
books.description: A meteorite strike accelerates the space program in the 1950s.

books.title: Children of Time
books.author: Adrian Tchaikovsky
books.description: Uplifted spiders evolve on a terraformed world while humans flee dying Earth.

books.title: The Long Way to a Small, Angry Planet
books.author: Becky Chambers
books.description: A diverse crew tunnels through space on a worn-down ship.

books.title: The Expanse: Leviathan Wakes
books.author: James S.A. Corey
books.description: A detective and a ship captain uncover a conspiracy that threatens the solar system.

books.title: The Ministry for the Future
books.author: Kim Stanley Robinson
books.description: A UN agency works to advocate for future generations amid climate catastrophe.
